product_name: SmartWool PhD Ski Light Socks - Women's
long_description: The women's PhD Ski Light Socks are new and improved, and better than ever. They feature innovative new fabric, a more comfortable fit and smart design details that enhance performance. Ski socks have light cushioning in the shin and feet areas. New 4 Degree Elite Fit System improves comfort; 2 elastics provide greater stretch and recovery to keep the socks in place. Ankle bands, upper instep bands, lower instep bands and arch bands connect to the feet for a great fit and feel. New ReliaWool is a patent-pending reinforcement construction that puts more wool in high wear/high impact areas to increase durability and comfort. Merino wool provides excellent temperature control and moisture management, so you're warm when it's cold and cool when it's warm. Strategically placed mesh zones provide ventilation for temperature and moisture management. Merino wool keeps your feet dry and is naturally odor resistant. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. Flat-knit toe double toe seams have high burst strength. 1x1 ribbed welt and 1x1 ribbed legs. SmartWool PhD Ski Light socks have an 13 in. height. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The women's PhD Ski Light Socks are new and improved, and better than ever. They feature innovative new fabric, a more comfortable fit and smart design details that enhance performance.
